text: TSV St. Johann is an Austrian football club from St Johann im Pongau, a town in the state of Salzburg. They play in the Regionalliga Salzburg, the third level of Austrian football. ==History== The club was founded in 1949 as multi- discipline sports club. One part of the club was football. In 2007 the football team became a independent club. 1970/71 and 1971/72 they played in the Regionalliga West which was then the 2nd level in Austrian football. 2008 they were promoted to Regionalliga West, the third level in Austrian football. The second team is playing in the 2.
